meanings.definition: A printing process using a rotary press with intaglio cylinders.
meanings.sent1: The rotogravure produced clear images on the paper.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful picture in the magazine's rotogravure section.
meanings.sent3: The rotogravure made the photos look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a rotogravure, etched vividly in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The rotogravure added depth and detail to the printed images.

meanings.definition: A section of a newspaper or magazine printed using the rotogravure process.
meanings.sent1: The rotogravure in the newspaper showcased stunning photographs.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy flipping through the rotogravure of that magazine.
meanings.sent3: The rotogravure made the news more visually appealing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the rotogravure lit up the whole page.
meanings.sent5: The rotogravure section captured the essence of the event perfectly.
